awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: Woody Allen's sentimental reminiscence about the golden age of radio. A series of vignettes involving radio personalities is intertwined with the life of a working class family in Rockaway Beach, NY circa 1942.
plot: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.
title: Radio Days
